required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Protein Intake Plus Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation on Muscle Mass in Hospitalized Elderly
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Protein Intake Plus Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation on Muscle Mass in Hospitalized Elderly: a Randomized Controlled Clinical Study

lead_sponsor.agency: University of Sao Paulo General Hospital

clinical_study.source: University of Sao Paulo General Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to investigate the effects of supplementation of protein plus sessions of electrostimulation on muscle mass, length of hospital stay, readmission and mortality of hospitalized elderly.

detailed_description.textblock: Hospitalized elderly people show malnutrition, physical inactivity, and pronounced systemic inflammation which may be exacerbated the catabolic state and promote drastic muscle wasting during the hospitalization and, thus increasing the length of stay, morbidity, and mortality. Therefore, the aim of this study is to investigate the effects of supplementation of protein plus sessions of electrostimulation on muscle mass, length of hospital stay, readmission, and mortality of hospitalized elderly.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of admission until the date of medical discharge. Up to 30 days.
primary_outcome.description: Vastus Lateralis Muscle Cross-sectional Area will be assessed through ultrasound

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of admission until the date of medical discharge. Up to 30 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Muscle function evaluated trough battery of test

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of admission until the date of medical discharge. Up to 30 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Nutritional status will be assessed through nutritional records during hospital stay

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of admission until the date of medical discharge. Up to 30 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Strength will be evaluated using handgrip strength test

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of admission until the date of medical discharge. Up to 30 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Functional independence will be assessed using Barthel Index

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of admission until the date of medical discharge. Up to 30 days.
secondary_outcome.description: Length of hospital stay will be the time (in days) until medical discharge.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of admission until the date of medical discharge. Up to 30 days.

secondary_outcome.description: Hospital readmission post-medical discharge will be the number of times that he is admitted in the hospital post-medical discharge.
Health costs will be estimated by means of the questionnaire with questions about the use of health services or equipment.

arm_group.description: Patients allocated to this arm will be submitted to intervention (protein supplementation plus neuromuscular electrostimulation).
Patients allocated to this arm will be submitted to a placebo intervention (isocaloric supplement plus sham for neuromuscular electrostimulation).

intervention.description: Patients will receive diary 2 doses of the protein supplement
Patients will receive diary sessions of neuromuscular electrostimulation.
Patients will receive diary 2 doses of the isocaloric supplement
Patients will not receive neuromuscular electrostimulation.

overall_official.affiliation: University of Sao Paulo General Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: University of Sao Paulo General Hospital
